The banyan tree in Lahaina is a sacred landmark for me and my ohana.Reports are saying it’s been charred, but still salvageable.Praying for better days
In East Maui - Helicopters with buckets of swimming pool water being dumped on hotspots as firefighters in Maui work against wildfire flareups.@weatherchannel continues storytelling in Maui
Brush fire in #Upcountry #Maui. Not sure how close it is to homes, but we can see the glow getting bigger from here in #Pukalani.

There’s a fire in every town/city of Maui right now. Lahaina residents are finding safety in the ocean. News outlets reporting that the coast guard is patrolling the coastline to rescue them
